Detailed Description

template<class TYPE, class BOX_GEOMETRY>
class SAMRAI::pdat::IndexIterator< TYPE, BOX_GEOMETRY >

Class IndexIterator is the iterator associated with the IndexData This class provides methods for stepping through the list that contains the irregular index set. The user should access this class through the name IndexData<TYPE>::Iterator.

This iterator should be used as follows: 

 * IndexData<TYPE> data;
 * ...
 * for (IndexData<TYPE>::Iterator iter(data); iter; iter++ {
 *    ... = iter();
 * }
 *

See also:
tbox::List

pdat::IndexData

pdat::IndexIterator

template<class TYPE, class BOX_GEOMETRY>
SAMRAI_INLINE_KEYWORD SAMRAI::pdat::IndexIterator< TYPE, BOX_GEOMETRY >::IndexIterator (  ) 

Default constructor for the index list iterator. The iterator must be initialized before it can be used to iterate over an IndexData object.

Constructor for the index list iterator. The iterator will iterate over the irregular index set of the argument data object.
